meanings.sent1: The mustachioed man smiled warmly at the children.
meanings.sent2: The detective in the movie was mustachioed and mysterious.
meanings.sent3: The mustachioed cat looked quite dapper with its tiny whiskers.
meanings.sent4: The mustachioed tree branches reached out like fingers in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The mustachioed gentleman's facial hair was thick and well-groomed.

meanings.sent1: The mustachioed cowboy tipped his hat to the crowd.
meanings.sent2: The mustachioed actor played the role of a villain in the play.
meanings.sent3: The mustachioed clown made the children giggle with his silly antics.
meanings.sent4: The mustachioed mountain stood proudly against the horizon.
meanings.sent5: The mustachioed soldier looked brave and determined in his uniform.
